mainEntity.name: How is Deutsche Bank using blockchain in cross-border payments?

acceptedAnswer.text: Deutsche Bank aims to use blockchain technology to offer faster and cheaper international transfers by eliminating intermediaries in cross-border payments.

mainEntity.name: What is the Marco Polo Network?

acceptedAnswer.text: The main challenges include regulatory uncertainty, scalability of blockchain systems, integration with legacy infrastructure, and ensuring security and privacy of sensitive data.
